forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then clearing with ample sunshine by the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
